New Zealand your medical system and professionals are a joke! #OMGThisPlace #ThisMustBeHell #WordToTheWiseBeWarnedAndStayAway
Thankful I haven't needed this in 6 years and counting. #HydrocephalusAwarenessMonth2016 #WheresThatCureAlreadyðŸ’™ðŸ’™ðŸ’™ https://t.co/SjPxQQCH9P
It requires Brain surgery to Treat this condition #HAM2016 #WeNeedACure https://t.co/7dG1AAIbzC
My heart is sad @ the sudden loss of a friend. Cancer does not care. She was so positive & full of hope. A few months was all she had #RIPðŸŒ¹
Feels like child labour but she is not to be dissuaded. Her mind is made up and she's determined #ScaryWhenYouSeeYourselfInYourChildren
Working from home today. My 6 year old is bored so she decided to clean the "whole house". #MyStrongwilledLittleGirlIsGrowingUp
Determination is a good driver to getting things done sooner rather than later #MyLifeMatters
I once was asked what superpower I wish I had. I now have an answer. To transport myself back in time to before I was born. #AnotherLife
Felt "off" today not sure why.... #IHateFeelingYuckâ˜¹ï¸
People can be so disgusting at times. Something's simply can't be unseen! #Ewwww!!!#WishICouldJustLookTheOtherWay
Gotta luv public transport that works & is safe 2 use. Till someone decides 2 fart next 2 u with nowhere 2 go is #DisgustedAndUnimpressed
A new year with new beginnings. I pray it's going to be a good one for all #FeelingHopeful
I have a dream to start this book but not sure how to get started. Praying for guidance and clarity. #HydroBabiesDeserveAChance
Excitement is mounting. Can't wait for Christmas. Excited to spend time with people who I haven't seen in too long. #ChristmasIsAboutFamily
Ever feel like running away but have nowhere to go? That's how I feel today...#JustFeelingBleh
Enabling others does not help them. In fact, it makes them lazy. Tired of being other people's doormat. #SayHelloToTheNewMe
This weekend really took the wind out of my sails again. Getting back on the horse #HydrocephalusWhyOhWhy
Starting work on my new book this weekend. Woke up early with my brain chattering away #NeedMySleepButThisBookMustBreathe #SuperExcited!!!
#BecauseImHappy
At the start of each day I pray for peace, quiet and acceptance of all that is to come my way. Being thankful for the little things #HappyMe
Praying for strength for my family more than me. Feel like such a burden, wish I could make it easier for them. #AMagicWandWouldBeNice
Too scared to close my eyes. Have fears of not waking up, just too much to handle and yet I have to believe & trust in God #LordITrustInYou
Wish I new exactly what ETV failure feels like. My gut tells me something is wrong but I don't know for sure. #IDontKnowWhatToThinkAnymore
Why is it that when I decide to have a good day, the universe conspires and I end up having all kinds of crap come my way? #FeelingBleh
Trying my hand @ a new recipe 2night. Hope my kids like it & I don't mess it up #KindaLoveBeingASingleMumEvenIfItsJust4TwoWeeks
Every time I read part of my book Hydrocephalus: Floating Faithfully I can't believe I endured all of that #HydrocephalusAwarenessMatters
Looking at Hydrocephalus: Floating Faithfully by Celeste A. Daniels @SkyeWater33 at #smashwords https://t.co/bCVITK8mcM
A portion of the sales will be donated to Hydrocephalus Association to fund research for a cure #Hydrocephalus #ThereIsNoCure #WeAllNeedOne
My brain child is born - Hydrocephalus: Floating Faithfully is available online https://t.co/bCVITK8mcM. #HydrocephalusAwarenessMatters
Peace surrounds me & my heart feels full. Oh glorious joy never leave me...
Happiness comes naturally & floating euphorically from second to second is as easy as breathing.
If I could bask in the luxurious feeling that flutters of my heart bring I'd stay forever. The whole world seems perfect & nothing deters me
New book...soon to be released!!! Watch this space. Hydrocephalus: Floating Faithfully coming soon ðŸ˜ #HydrocephalusAwarenessMonth
A new day, a new week & a new attitude. This weeks resolution #DoSomethingYouAreProudOf
Hydrocephalus awareness matters #HydrocephalusDoesNotDiscriminate http://t.co/4BIZRkafrU
With every new day comes a new slate to start over or improve. The past is gone forever but the lessons remain #MakeEachNewDayCount
@sarahdessen the two things which go together perfectly #RedWineAndPizza
When disappointment comes knocking I don't know if I should just feel sad or cry #MyHeartFeelsBruised
Funniest thing a neurosurgeon said to me "Codeine makes you constipated and you don't need that kind of pressure" #FindHumourInHydrocephalus
Study stress...nothing makes sense #PendingExamStress #MemoryChallengesAndUncharteredTerritory #RunForTheHills!!! #ClosingBook2Sleep
#HydroDeJaVu #LonelyAsWorld #DifferentCountrySameShxxx
Emergency Department is NOT a plan!!! #NoteToSelfThereIsNOHelpAtTheED
I feel so helpless... #WannaCloseMyEyesAndWakeUpToYourAbsence
I hate it when Hydrocephalus rears its ugly head. #IdRatherHaveAHangoverThanPressureHeadache #ThePainJustDoesntStop #HurtsSoBAD boohoo!!!
@SkyeWater33 For women but esp men to read...#RelationshipFoodForThought Why do women leave...? http://t.co/95do3uYQCw
There's a mouse in the house and no cat! #WhatToDoWhatToDo #He'sCuteAndTinyButGnawingAtSomething
I'm soooo over this day already!!! #MondayGetLostAndDontAttemptToFindYourWayBack
Your best is always good enough. Don't set the bar too high for yourself, life has more importance than the mundane tasks #Prioritize4Sanity
Focus on the positive and glaze over the negativity #NoRoomForNegativeSituationsOrPeople
How beautiful your creation oh Lord! Love the ocean...sight, sound and smell #ItSoothesMySoul
Hydrocephalus is a lonely world, sad when medical professionals become obstacles in the maze of the condition. #FloatingFaithfully #TrustGod
Why are teenagers so difficult to deal with? I knew better when I was growing up #CanICloseMyEyesAndWakeUpToTheAdultYou? #WhereCanIRun?
Wellington on a beautiful sunny day, like today is an absolute blessing. The sights, sounds, smells & atmosphere #AbsolutelyBrilliantILuvIt!
#FloatingFaithfully will be a testament to God's presence in my life and hope for others #SubmitFaithfullyICanDoAnythingThroughHimWhoLovesMe
Hydro dried up my short-term memory but seeing it come alive on the pages I write is #PricelessAsHydrocephalusDoesNotHaveMeButGodDoes
So when I need a reminder of the good God has done in my life, I can flip thru the pages #LeavingALastingReminderAndTestament
Only after writing my books, do I clearly see God's presence all the time. The mystery is, I never saw it at the time #HeIsAlwaysWithUs
Our experiences in life, good and ESP bad need to be shared. It is thru sharing this with others that they learn #DoItForTheNextGeneration
We are here to learn from each other #CertainlyDoesntSeemLikeRocketScience
I want me as a mother and wife in my next life... ðŸ˜Š http://t.co/dkzSs2v6HV
#IStandWithDowncastEyes #YetReadyForWhateverYouLayAtMyFeetOhLord http://t.co/FPVtLQ1IuX
1000 rejections are nowhere near the satisfaction of just 1 positive response to a submission #ForeverHopefullWillKeepOnKeepingOn
Starting to feel like a zombie. Not even coffee can help. #TakingOnTooMuchAsUsual http://t.co/edcqOLVlIH
Thank you Lord for my husband! Absolutely hate spiders, big black hairy one's. #OhNoUGotsToDieNow #MustBDone #HateSpidersPassionately
Some interruptions and pauses are needed. We might not always understand or plan for them but trust the reason why. #LifesPausesRGood
